Question: This person played bass on "Peace Dream", and sang a duet with Starr on "Walk with You.
Hints: This person wanted the tour to avoid large venues; most of the small halls they played had capacities of fewer than 3,000 people.
They arrested this person and brought him to a local jail while the Japanese government decided what to do.
This person commented, "I prefer to think of my approach to music as ..
